dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3621386S] [Fwd: [ADMINS] inquiery on cadreview.ru. CONFIDENTIAL]
dmca.body:
Please note that ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc. is the network
provider for www.cadreview.ru , however we are not the registrar of the
website in question as of March 26, 2007.

Legal Response Team

-----Original Message-----
From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Sunday, March 25, 2007 10:01 AM
To: Copyright
Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3621386S] [Fwd: [ADMINS] inquiery on
cadreview.ru. CONFIDENTIAL]

MIME element (text/plain) 
TO ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc. 
1333 North Stemmons Freeway, Suite 110, Dallas, TX, 75207, USA 
by e-mail 
 
Dear Sirs, 
 
Please, mind the confidential notice at the end of the letter. This
e-mail must NOT be sent to the cadreview.ru owner. 
 
I am an IP lawyer representing the interests of the "cadreview"
trademark holder in Russia. 
 
According to the WHOIS records on the IP address for "cadreview.ru"
domain name you are the hosting provider.  
For the time being I am at the stage of preparing a case against the
domain name holder and I need you to confirm that the domain name in
issue is hosted with you as it is an important point under the Russian
law and our case circumstances. Later, if approved by the client you
might be sent an official demand as to the domain name.  
 
For now, please, confirm or deny that you are host the site for
"cadreview.ru" domain name. 
NO OTHER ACTIONS AGAINST THE DOMAIN NAME OR ITS HOLDER ARE NECESSARY. 
 
Sincerely yours, 
Vadim Kolosov 
IP Lawyer 
http://law-help.info 
 
--  
 
This message is for the sole use of its intended recipient and contains
information that is legally privileged, confidential, exempt from
disclosure and may also be copyrighted. It may be read, saved, copied
and used only by the intended recipient. 
If you are not the intended recipient and/or have received this
communication in error, please notify me immediately and delete the
original message, all its copies (regardless of partial or whole),
including attachments if any. Any unauthorized review, use, disclosure,
distribution, copying or any other action in respect of the content of
this e-mail (in whole or in part) is strictly prohibited.  
No consent to the use of sender's contact information for direct
marketing purposes, other unsolicited e-mails (SPAM) and for transfers
of data to third parties is hereby granted.  
Unless explicitly so designated this e-mail does not bind me legally.  
E-mail may be susceptible to data corruption, interception, unauthorized
amendment, tampering and virus, and I do not accept liability for any of
the aforesaid and the consequences thereof. Be advised that e-mail
message headers (including sender field) may be easily tampered by
others, the intended recipient should ascertain the content integrity
and authenticity of an e-mail in case of important information contained
within (particularly, binding statements).  
This notice once made is valid through all the correspondence between
the sender and the recipient. Absence of this notice in previous
correspondence is not a waiver of rights and cautions herein.
